Package com.dtdsoftware.splunk.transport

Interface Summary
Transport This interface can be implemented to provide custom transport logic to send data to Splunk The custom implementation class can then be placed on the classpath and declared in the configuration xml file.
 

Class Summary
File Transport that outputs to file Uses the file.logger logger in the underlying log configuration file
RestApi Transport implementation that uses the Splunk Java SDK to send events to the receivers/simple or receivers/stream REST endpoints Uses the rest.logger logger in the underlying log configuration file
StdOut Default transport.
Syslog Transport that sends events over syslog(UDP) Uses the syslog.logger logger in the underlying log configuration file
TCP Transport that sends events over a TCP socket
